content.2: And God spake unto Moses, and said unto him, I
content.3: And I appeared unto Abraham, unto Isaac, and unto Jacob, by
content.4: And I have also established my covenant with them, to give them the land of Canaan, the land of their pilgrimage, wherein they were strangers.
content.5: And I have also heard the groaning of the children of Israel, whom the Egyptians keep in bondage; and I have remembered my covenant.
content.6: Wherefore say unto the children of Israel, I
content.7: And I will take you to me for a people, and I will be to you a God: and ye shall know that I
content.8: And I will bring you in unto the land, concerning the which I did swear to give it to Abraham, to Isaac, and to Jacob; and I will give it you for an heritage: I
content.9: And Moses spake so unto the children of Israel: but they hearkened not unto Moses for anguish of spirit, and for cruel bondage.
content.11: Go in, speak unto Pharaoh king of Egypt, that he let the children of Israel go out of his land.
content.15: And the sons of Simeon; Jemuel, and Jamin, and Ohad, and Jachin, and Zohar, and Shaul the son of a Canaanitish woman: these
content.17: The sons of Gershon; Libni, and Shimi, according to their families.
content.18: And the sons of Kohath; Amram, and Izhar, and Hebron, and Uzziel: and the years of the life of Kohath
content.19: And the sons of Merari; Mahali and Mushi: these
content.20: And Amram took him Jochebed his father’s sister to wife; and she bare him Aaron and Moses: and the years of the life of Amram
content.21: And the sons of Izhar; Korah, and Nepheg, and Zichri.
content.22: And the sons of Uzziel; Mishael, and Elzaphan, and Zithri.
content.23: And Aaron took him Elisheba, daughter of Amminadab, sister of Naashon, to wife; and she bare him Nadab, and Abihu, Eleazar, and Ithamar.
content.24: And the sons of Korah; Assir, and Elkanah, and Abiasaph: these
content.25: And Eleazar Aaron’s son took him
content.28: And it came to pass on the day
